#include<stdio.h>
#define MAX 200004

int merge(int a[],int tmp[],int l,int mid,int r)
{
	int i=l,j=mid,k=l,cnt=0;
	while((i<=mid-1)&&(j<=r))
	{
		if(a[i]<a[j])
			tmp[k++]=a[i++];
		else
		{
			tmp[k++]=a[j++];
			cnt = cnt + (mid-i);
		}
	}
	while(i<=mid-1)
		tmp[k++]=a[i++];
	while(j<=r)
		tmp[k++]=a[j++];
	for(i=l;i<=r;i++)
		a[i]=tmp[i];
return cnt;
}

int merge_sort(int a[],int tmp[],int l,int r)
{
	
	int cnt=0,mid;
	if(l<r)
	{
		mid=(l+r)/2;
		cnt=merge_sort(a,tmp,l,mid);
		cnt+=merge_sort(a,tmp,mid+1,r);
		cnt+=merge(a,tmp,l,mid+1,r);
	}
return cnt;
}

int main()

{
	int n,a[MAX],i,cnt=0,tt,tmp[MAX];
//	scanf("%d",&tt);
//	printf("\n");
//	while(tt--)
//	{
		cnt=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			scanf("%d",&a[i]);
//		printf("\n");
		cnt = merge_sort(a,tmp,0,n-1);//	for(i=0;i<n;i++) //		printf("%d\t",a[i]);	printf("\n");
		printf("%d\n",cnt);
	//}
return 0;
}
